tellolib.control

Class TelloControl

  • java.lang.Object
    • tellolib.control.TelloControl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TelloControlInterface

    public class TelloControl
extends java.lang.Object
implements TelloControlInterface
    TelloControl interface. Provides high level wrappers for library classes used to send commands to the drone.

      • stopStatusMonitor

        public void stopStatusMonitor()
        Description copied from interface: TelloControlInterface

        Specified by:

      • startKeepAlive

        public void startKeepAlive()
        Description copied from interface: TelloControlInterface
        Start keep alive thread that pings the Tello every 10 seconds with a get battery level command to keep the Tello from shutting down automatically if it receives no commands for 15 seconds.
        Specified by:
        startKeepAlive in interface TelloControlInterface

      • stopKeepAlive

        public void stopKeepAlive()
        Description copied from interface: TelloControlInterface
        Stops the keep alive thread. Thread will be stopped when disconnect() is called.
        Specified by:
        stopKeepAlive in interface TelloControlInterface

      • setMissionMode

        public void setMissionMode(boolean enabled,
                           MissionDetectionCamera camera)
        Description copied from interface: TelloControlInterface
        Set mission mode state. In mission mode, status monitoring will record information about any mission pad detected by the selected camera(s).
        Specified by:
        setMissionMode in interface TelloControlInterface
        Parameters:
        enabled - True to enable, false to disable.
        camera - Select which camera(s) used for detection when enabled.
